abstract: Venus Williams defeats Magda Linette of Poland to clinch victory for United States Fed Cup team in Group II's first round; other tennis news noted.
snippet: Venus Williams clinched victory for the United States Fed Cup team against Poland in Kailua-Kona, Hawaii, in Group II’s first round, advancing her team to the World Group Playoff in April.
lead_paragraph: Venus Williams clinched victory for the United States Fed Cup team against Poland in Kailua-Kona, Hawaii, in Group II’s first round, advancing her team to the World Group Playoff in April.
